title: metaplanetary
author: metaplanetary
content: MetaPlanetaryÂ  Launches MPY Token Airdrop and Pre-sale on Binance Smart ChainMetaPlanetary , a rollup chain for the metaverse, has announced the launch of its governance token, MPY, with an initial supply cap of 80 million tokens. The MPY token is a BEP-20 token native to the MetaPlanetary rollup chain.The MPY token can now be obtained through participating in the airdrop and pre-sale, with listings on top-tier exchanges such as Binance, Okex, Upbit, and Coinbase to follow.During the airdrop, users can send a BNB wallet address to receive 20 MPY tokens for free. Additionally, users can share their referral link with friends and receive 1 MPY token for each referral, with up to 50 referrals possible and a reward of up to 120 MPY tokens.The pre-sale is currently live, with a price of 1 BNB equaling 1024 MPY tokens. The minimum purchase is 0.1 BNB, and the maximum purchase is 10 BNB. Tokens will be distributed based on the arrival time of BNB, with refunds automatically issued if the pre-sale is sold out.The initial token allocation for MPY is as follows: 40% for the ecosystem, 8% for the team and advisors, 5% for the pre-sale, 2% for the airdrop, 20% for burning, 5% for strategic offers, and 5% for SCO.MetaPlanetary aims to provide secure scaling for the Binance Smart Chain, with a focus on decentralizing the issuance, management, and use of digital identities in the metaverse. The platform also provides a decentralized solution for cross-border payments while maintaining compliance measures such as KYC and AML.For more information about the MPY token and MetaPlanetary , please visit their website at https://metaplanetary.io/
